author: LeoBarca-10
body: I am heavily invested in Fortinet. As for the “why” do your DD and just look at the growth in that last 1 year. It’s competitors are the likes of Cisco and paloalto and fortinet is starting to have majority of some markets. Targets for the stock are $350+ usd. This is not financial advice.
